A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A bloated\, clumsy behemoth of a film that doesn't respect the rules of the Star Wars universe\, doesn't care for continuity or deliverance on existing storylines\, and treats characters like advertisments for action figures. Would have been better as a SpaceBalls reboot\, not a Star Wars film. Very disappointing. Let's hope JJ can salvage what's left of the saga for episode 9.
